name: vscode-kdb-q
description: Provides kdb+/q language features for Visual Studio Code

commands.title: kdb-q: Run current line as query
kdb-q: Run explorer item as query

vscode-kdb-q.consoleViewEnabled.description: Console view: Whether query results should be printed to the kdb-q console.

vscode-kdb-q.gridViewEnabled.description: Grid view: Whether table query results should be printed to the grid view.

vscode-kdb-q.documentViewEnabled.description: Document view: Whether query results should be printed to a syntax highlighted virtual document.

enumDescriptions: The panel of current active editor
The panel beside the current active editor
The panel of the first editor
The panel of the second editor
The panel of the third editor
The panel of the fourth editor
The panel of the fifth editor
The panel of the sixth editor
The panel of the seventh editor
The panel of the eight editor
The panel of the ninth editor
vscode-kdb-q.gridViewPosition.description: Grid view: The view column used show the grid view.

enumDescriptions: The panel of grid result view
The panel of current active editor
The panel beside the current active editor

The panel of the fifth editor
The panel of the sixth editor
The panel of the seventh editor
The panel of the eight editor
The panel of the ninth editor
vscode-kdb-q.documentViewPosition.description: Document view: The view column used show the document view.

vscode-kdb-q.serverList.description: Servers: List of preset kdb+ servers.

enumDescriptions: Disables server grouping
Groups the servers by hostname
vscode-kdb-q.serverGroupMode.description: Servers: The group mode for the server list.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
